==== Settings Files for MAP Charts ====
======  map.default======
Settings file available at: [[Settings:map.default | map.default]]
Display a variable in a heat map. Example:

===== Example Chart =====

<img src="../images/help/MAP-settings.PNG" width="300px" />

===== Code =====

<source>
{{
#widget: HeatMap |
  | query = 'SELECT (SUM(<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer>(?grant)) AS ?sumGrant) ?regionname WHERE {
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/grant> ?grant .
      ?role <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/region> ?region . 
      ?region <http://ammap.com/region/name> ?regionname .
      }
    GROUP BY ?regionname'
  | map =  'united_kingdom_regions'
  | input = 'regionname'
  | output = {{ 'sumGrant' }}
}}
</source>
